feature.get-to: Get to the next level with these features.
feature.search-for-description: You can find all the public profile on Fortnite, Even if the account is an Xbox, PS or EpicGames.
feature.keep-your-description: You can keep close your 5 recent searches that you made through the use of Llamatracker.
feature.analyze-profiles-description: Track players' progress and analyze their stacks, WIN, KDA, K/M and more.
feature.realtime-daily-description: Fresh as everyday, the shop get updated each day with new items.
feature.detail-item-description: You can see all today's items details, what it includes, item type, how much it costs and more.
feature.know-when-description: Track items when it was released and when it leaves the daily shop and never get out without your favorite item.
feature.official-news-description: Stay informed with the recent official news all about FORTNITE and its different games.
feature.read-the-description: Chose what to read and stay informed with the official news.

about.our-vision-description: Our vision to make an efficient application to help the FORTNITE community to find and analyze statistics without ADS or any intrusive element.
about.in-llamatracker-description: In Llamatracker, you will find all you need to COMPREHEND your profile, you friends' profiles or search the stats of your favorite PRO PLAYER
about.users-description: Trusted by over 99k+ users around the world
about.all-over-description: Have access to LLamatracker all over the world
about.realtime-description: See the today's shop in realtime, totally updated

apple.label: Download on the iOS App Store

android.label: Download on the Google Play Store
